Why you see this thrift shop on Binance Smart Chain?

This is purely experimental. I want to demonstrate construction of a functional online marketplace where users may proceed to select, proceed to payment through Metamask. Traditional online marketplaces like Amazon, Alibaba, Shopee, Lazada... etc, all depends on credit cards or banks transaction. But this shop is fully independent. All you need is Metamask wallet with some crypto-currency (in the case of Binance Smart Chain, you need BNB). However, you pay the item at your own risk. You have to trust the merchant from the other side (in this case, I am the merchant). To learn more about how you may code your own marketplace like this one, check out the github repo. I will only deliver the item within Malaysia and Singapore! Think before you buy! I simply want to do some experiment!Seriously!

This marketplace is on BSC Testnet! Nothing will be delivered!
